subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Toshiaki Nishioka of Japan beat Genaro García of Mexico on a technical knockout in the 12th round to retain his World Boxing Council super bantamweight interim champion title in Yokohama, Japan.
snippet: Toshiaki Nishioka of Japan beat Genaro García of Mexico on a technical knockout in the 12th round to retain his World Boxing Council super bantamweight interim champion title in Yokohama, Japan.
